name: adobe_experience_platform_tutorials
author: Wendy Braun
meta_keywords: Tutorials, Adobe Experience Platform, Experience Platform, Platform, Connector, Data Access, Dataset, Data set, Creating a dataset, Creating a Connector, Data Ingestion, ingest data

pages.title: Authenticate and access Adobe Experience Platform APIs
pages.description: Follow this step-by-step guide to gain access to an Adobe Experience Platform developer account in order to make calls to Experience Platform APIs.

pages.title: Create a schema using the Schema Editor
pages.description: Interact with the Schema Registry via the Schema Editor user interface to create a schema, classes, and mixins.

pages.title: Create a schema using the Schema Registry API
pages.description: Use the Schema Registry API to create a schema, including assigning a class and defining mixins.

pages.title: Create a dataset using APIs
pages.description: Create a dataset based on a pre-configured schema using Catalog and Data Ingestion APIs.

pages.title: Create a connector in the UI
pages.description: Set-up, configure, and monitor data connectors using the user interface within Adobe Experience Platform.

pages.title: Amazon S3 connector
Azure Blob connector
Microsoft Dynamics connector
Salesforce connector
Create a connector using APIs
pages.description: Learn to create different types of data connectors, including Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics, Azure Blob, and Amazon S3.

pages.title: Add DULE labels in the UI
pages.description: Work with Data Usage Labeling and Enforcement (DULE) labels and apply them at the connection, dataset, and field-level using the user interface.

pages.title: Create and evaluate DULE Policies using Policy Service API
pages.description: Use the Data Usage Labeling and Enforcement (DULE) Policy Service API to create and evaluate data usage policies.

pages.title: Ingest data using the UI
pages.description: Create a dataset based on a schema and ingest data using the Experience Platform UI.

pages.title: Query dataset data using Data Access API
pages.description: Locate, access, and download data stored within a dataset using the Data Access API.

pages.title: Configure Real-Time Customer Profiles using APIs
pages.description: Follow this tutorial to configure Real-time Customer Profiles for your organization using Experience Platform APIs.

pages.title: Configure a dataset for Customer Profile and Identity Service using APIs
pages.description: Create, configure, and work with datasets enabled for use with Profile and Identity services.

pages.title: Add data to Customer Profile
pages.description: Configure schemas for use with Profile Service and learn to ingest data via batch or streaming ingestion.

pages.title: Access Customer Profile data using APIs
pages.description: Learn multiple ways to access Profile Service data on Experience Platform, including accessing data by identity and accessing an exported segment.

pages.title: Configure merge policies
pages.description: Follow steps to create new merge policies for your organization, as well as how to access and update existing merge policies.

pages.title: Configure edge destinations and projections using APIs
pages.description: Configure Edge Service by creating projection configurations and the destinations they route to, as used by Projection Service.

pages.title: Create a segment using APIs
pages.description: Create segments using Real-time Customer Profiles.

pages.title: Manage Decisioning Service entities using APIs
pages.description: Create and manage entities supporting Decisioning Service features.

pages.title: Work with the Decisioning Service runtime using APIs
pages.description: Create decision models and make decisioning requests.

pages.title: Privacy Service API tutorial
pages.description: Create and manage data access and delete requests that comply with privacy regulations using APIs

pages.title: Privacy Service UI tutorial
pages.description: Create and manage data access and delete requests that comply with privacy regulations using the UI
